title: Analysis and Application of Factors Influencing Knowledge Acquisition (AOK) in Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Implementation of organizational security/safety procedure learning scenarios via VR simulation, ensuring smartphone-based accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of organizational culture awareness on knowledge acquisition (AOK).
Learners evaluate the influence of self-efficacy on work procedure application through VR simulations.
Learners analyze the mediating role of motivation in the knowledge integration process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
